SELECT c.id, c.code, c.created_at, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.status, c.amount, c.bank_name, c.bank_account, c.payment_day, c.deposit_owner, c.relationship, c.payment_email, c.is_deleted, c.etc,
e.name AS employee_name, cu.name AS customer_name,
GROUP_CONCAT(p.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS product_names
FROM contract c JOIN employee e ON c.employee_id = e.id JOIN customer cu ON c.customer_id = cu.id LEFT JOIN contract_product cp ON c.id = cp.contract_id LEFT JOIN product p ON cp.product_id = p.id
WHERE c.employee_id = #{employeeId} AND NOT c.is_deleted GROUP BY c.id
